channel.title: With my grand exchange
channel.description:
Ok well i started developing a grand exchange and so far i have this: - Deposit Any Item In The Game - ::exitems Shows all your deposited items (3 max) - ::exremove # Removes the item 1-3 from the grand exchange... - Savemorinfo saves item id's + amounts - Loadmoreinfo loads item ids + amounts
But now with the buying i need to be able to do these things...
- ::exsearch searches through all grand exchange items - ::exbuy (itemnamehere) to buy an item if it is in grand exchange.
But they are player variables(items/amounts)... how can i like... get them from every person online in a 'for' statement? i tried and failed lol.

item.title: With my grand exchange
item.dc:creator: @00rYn00 00rYn00
item.description:
@00rYn00 wrote:

you could just make a “sendQuest” interface thing to show ALL items in the server, or are you trying to show a list of all the items that EACH person has in the server like…

             --billy322---
                  has

1.Bandos Godsword (set at a price of) 1.5m
2.White Partyhat (set at a price of) 12m
3.DragonFire Sheild (set at a price of) 100m

are you trying to do that ^ as your grand exchange, where you set the price for each sold item?

Read full topic

item.title: With my grand exchange
item.dc:creator: @Ancient_Maul Ancient Maul
item.description:
@Ancient_Maul wrote:

Ok well i started developing a grand exchange and so far i have this:

  • Deposit Any Item In The Game
  • ::exitems Shows all your deposited items (3 max)
  • ::exremove # Removes the item 1-3 from the grand exchange…
  • Savemorinfo saves item id’s + amounts
  • Loadmoreinfo loads item ids + amounts

But now with the buying i need to be able to do these things…

  • ::exsearch searches through all grand exchange items
  • ::exbuy (itemnamehere) to buy an item if it is in grand exchange.

But they are player variables(items/amounts)… how can i like… get them from every person online in a ‘for’ statement? i tried and failed lol.

Read full topic
